intro_prompt: I want to go meet those people, but I am scared to talk to them

needs_clue:
The answer is one of the needs in this list: safety, companionship, belonging, connection, freedom, growth, independence, respect, understanding.
Only guess one need at a time.
needs_general_bot_support_prompts: Hmmmm.  I do not think I understand what you are trying to say.  Try to guess the need?
